name: Sea Fighter + Lethal Weapon
overview: These two games were sold only as a compilation. 1) Seafighter - The game plays similarly to Buck Rogers: Planet of Zoom, with a horizon view, scrolling pseudo 3D perspective. Your joystick controls a cursor that can move anywhere on the screen and shoot objects as they approach. 2) Lethal Weapon - A vertical scrolling shooter similar to Xevious.
